Generated Narrative: CodeSystem question-max-occurs

Last updated: 2020-04-09 21:10:28+0000

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/question-max-occurs defines the following code:

CodeDisplayDefinition
* RepeatingElement can repeat an unlimited number of times.

name: MaxOccurs
title: MaxOccurs
description: Flags an element as having unlimited repetitions.

concept.definition: Element can repeat an unlimited number of times.
